remarks: Element of an open interval shifted by a displacement.  (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 11-Dec-2019.)
statement:
eliooshift.a $e |- ( ph -> A e. RR ) $.
eliooshift.b $e |- ( ph -> B e. RR ) $.
eliooshift.c $e |- ( ph -> C e. RR ) $.
eliooshift.d $e |- ( ph -> D e. RR ) $.
eliooshift $p |- ( ph -> ( A e. ( B (,) C ) <-> ( A + D ) e. ( ( B + D ) (,) ( C + D ) ) ) ) $.
